column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Friday November 11 in observance of Veterans Day.
UK Football Game traffic updates will start at approximately 9:00 a.m. on Saturday November 12.

column3: Traffic Alert for Haley Rd at I-64:
column4: Haley Rd is shutdown in both directions over I-64 until further notice due to a serious collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for Haley Rd at I-64:
column4: The exit ramp from I-64E onto Haley Rd is also shutdown.
